name: dragon_http
info: Dragon Research Group IPs that have been seen sending HTTP requests to Dragon Research Pods in the last 7 days. This report lists hosts that are highly suspicious and are likely conducting malicious HTTP attacks. LEGITIMATE SEARCH ENGINE BOTS MAY BE IN THIS LIST. This report is informational. It is not a blacklist, but some operators may choose to use it to help protect their networks and hosts in the forms of automated reporting and mitigation services.
